name: Stacey
reviewdetail: My laptop of more than five years, has been finally showing signs of wear and tear. Thanks to my husband and bother in law's help, they were able to navigate me to HP.

name: Tylor
reviewdetail: I'm so happy that I bought this laptop it is so fast and its size is perfect , so easy to carry to so simple to use and it helps a lot for your study I totally recommend it.

reviewdetail: We bought this recently and really are enjoying the ease of use

reviewdetail: I am glad I bought this model very fast. Love the finger print access

reviewdetail: Brought the laptop for my small business and would definitely recommend it to other business owners. It's sleek, it's stylish and it's powerful.

reviewdetail: Great laptop, this is my third envy, would recommend
